useCase.name: Enable Step Counter Feature
useCase.description: User can request to enable the Step Counter feature to track daily steps.

preconditions.precondition: ALFRED Device and Software are operational.

useCase.trigger: User requests to enable Step Counter feature.

mainSequence.step: Caregiver requests to enable Step Counter feature for User.
ALFRED Device notifies User about Step Counter availability.
Step Counter feature is now available.
